 Genre: Wrestling/Sport/Entertainment

 Container: mp4


 <a href=" http://lookpic.com/O/i2/1151/dsF2LHyw.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://lookpic.com/O/i2/1151/dsF2LHyw.png</a> 
 
WWE Legends Of Wrestling Box Set (3 Discs Covers & Labels Inc.)

 DVD 1: Jerry "The King" Lawler And The Junk Yard Dog It's the life and careers of Jerry "The King" Lawler And The Junk Yard Dog, as examined by their peers.
 
 Hall Of Famer Jim Ross hosts a roundtable discussion previously unavailable on DVD. Panelists Dusty Rhodes, Michael Hayes, Pat Patterson and Mike Graham share anecdotes, tales and insights of these two historical Superstars.
 
 In addition, the DVD is packed with hours of bonus matches and interviews including:

 The King & Jimmy Valiant Vs. Kerry Von Eric & Michael Hayes (AWA Jan 22 1989)
 The King Vs. Owen Hart (Wrestling Challenge July 6, 1993)
 The King vs. Roddy Piper (King of the Ring June 19, 1994)
 The King vs. Breat Hart (In Your House May 14, 1995)
 The King vs. Breat Hart (King of the Ring June 25, 1995 "Kiss my Foot" match)
 The King vs. Mart Garner (June 8, 1996)
 JYD & Sgt. Slaughter Vs. Iron Sheik & Nikolai Volkoff (Nov. 10, 1984)
 JYD Vs. Greg Valentine (Wrestlemania March 31, 1985 I.C. title match)
 JYD Vs. Randy Savage (Wrestling Classic Nov. 7 1985 Tournament Final Match)
 JYD Vs. Adrian Adonis (SNME March 1, 1986)
 JYD Vs. Harley Race (SNME Jan. 3 1987)
 JYD Vs. Harley Race (Wrestlemania III March 29, 1987 "Loser Must Bow" match)

 DVD 2: Ric Flair And Sgt. Slaughter

 It's the life and career of WWE Hall Of Famers Ric Flair And Sgt. Slaughter, as examined by their peers. Hall Of Famer Jim Ross hosts a roundtable discussion
 previously unavailable on DVD. Panelists Dusty Rhodes, Michael Hayes, Pat Patterson and Mike Graham share anecdotes, tales and insights of these two historical Superstars. In addition, the DVD is packed with hours of bonus

 matches and interviews including:

 The Sarge Vs. Mike Rotundo (Mid-Atlantic May 12 1982)
 The Sarge Vs. Bob Backlund (Sept. 24 1983 Texas Death Match WWF Title)
 The Sarge Vs. Iron Sheik (April 23, 1984)
 The Sarge Vs. Col. DeBeers (AWA SuperClash III Dec 13, 1988 Boot Camp Match)
 Flair Vs. Lex Luger (Starrcade Dec. 26, 1988 NWA Heavyweight Title Match)
 Flair & Sting Vs. Terry Funk & The Great Muta 
 (Halloween Havoc Oct. 28, 1989 Thunderdome Match)
 Flair Vs. Curt Hennig (WCW Nitro Oct. 11, 1999)

 DVD 3: Heatseekers

 Join Hall Of Famer Jim Ross as he hosts a panel Featuring Michael Hays, Mick Foley, Eric Bischoff And Jerry "The King" Lawler as they share anecdotes, tales and insights into some of the most controversial stars of professional wrestling, including Scott Hall, Lex Lugar, Buff Bagwell, Vince Russo and more. 

This unique and insightful program has never been available on DVD. In addition, the DVD is packed with hours of bonus matches including: 

 Freebirds Vs. Ron Shaw, Rene Goulet & Charlie Fulton (Aug. 4, 1984)
 Lex Luger & Barry Windham Vs. Tully Blanchard & Arn Anderson
 (Clash of the Champions March 27 1988 NWA World Tag title match)
 Midnight Express (Bobby Eaton, Stan Lane & Jim Cornette) Vs.
 Original Midnight Express (Jack Victory, Randy Rose & Paul Dangerously)
 (Chi-Town Rumble Feb. 20 1989 Loser Leaves NWA match)
 Lex Luger Vs. Michael Hayes (WrestleWar May 7, 1989 NWA US Title Match)
 Scott Hall Vs. Goldberg (WCW Nitro July 6, 1998 WCW US Title match)
 Scott Hall Vs. Kevin Nash (Halloween Havoc Oct. 25, 1998)
 Vince Russo Vs. Booker T (WCW Nitro, Sept. 25, 2000 Steel Cage for WCW title)
 Buff Bagwell Vs. Roddy Piper (Bash at the Beach July 11, 1999 Boxing match)
